name: Kol Restaurant - Kitchen & Bar on Rainbow Street
description: Kol Restaurant has become one of Reykjavík's most popular dining destinations since opening, offering innovative cuisine with significant emphasis on grilled dishes while occupying a prime location on the colorful Skólavörðustígur—the rainbow street painted in Pride colors that has become one of Reykjavík's most photographed thoroughfares, connecting downtown to the iconic Hallgrímskirkja church that dominates the city skyline. Located at Skólavörðustígur 40, the restaurant benefits from foot traffic of tourists walking between Laugavegur shopping street and Hallgrímskirkja, while the vibrant rainbow street provides an Instagram-worthy backdrop that attracts visitors seeking both excellent food and aesthetic experiences. The menu celebrates exciting innovations with variety spanning finger food, salads, fish, steaks, and desserts—the kitchen's expertise with charcoal grilling creates distinctive smoky flavors and perfect searing that makes their grilled steaks and other proteins particularly noteworthy. Signature dishes include gyoza tacos (fusion concept combining Japanese dumplings with Mexican presentation), charcoal grilled steaks showcasing premium beef with expert flame preparation, smoked salmon highlighting Iceland's exceptional Atlantic fish, grilled scallops demonstrating the kitchen's skill with delicate seafood, and roasted duck providing rich, flavorful alternative to lighter fish options. The restaurant offers multiple tasting menu options including Icelandic (focusing on local ingredients and traditional flavors).
